snippet: Mr. Becher, with Ed Valenti and Arthur Schiff, produced television spots that became kitsch classics and made their company millions in sales.
abstract: Barry H Becher, one of the masterminds behind television commercials advertising Ginsu knives broadcast from 1978 to 1984, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Becher, with Ed Valenti and Arthur Schiff, produced television spots that became kitsch classics and made their company millions in sales.

headline.seo: Barry Becher, a Creator of Ginsu Knife Commercials, Dies at 71
headline.main: Barry Becher, a Creator of Ginsu Knife Commercials, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Barry H. Becher, 71, a Creator Of Ginsu Knife Commercials
